yes
my friend taught me how to play and now im rank 10
没人陪我玩一直都是自己玩屠夫特别喜欢玩凛妹，游戏不错以前看直播的时候第一次就被这游戏吸引了，有没有一起玩的啊，加我一起玩。还有一句话韩国棒子我囸你仙人。

Killer main for most of these 26 hours of playtime, low purple rank now. Very fun game. I keep getting styled on by people with flashlights and I can't tell if they're making fun of me when the crouch or being friendly. It's currently the best time to get into the game thanks to all the bloodpoints flowing.
very good 10 potatoes out of 10 doritos
Always expanding. New characters. Team play. Excellent graphics. Always something to do! I might be infatuated with the Trapper. XD

this game is damn near a masterpiece of both atmosphere and gameplay. there are many imitators, but there is only one asymmetrical horror game: and that is Dead By Daylight.

i've tried many other games. there were no doubt good but had issues: Last Year was a masterpiece but was left to rot, and F13 is a bit too slow paced (for me anyway). DBD has no signs of stopping anytime soon, and with 5 years under it's belt, the devs know what they're doing.

is it scary? yes. not because of the dark tones, gruesome killers, or nerve-wracking tasks admist a bloodsoaked land, tho. the real fear... is crutch perks.

jokes aside DBD is a must play on steam and if it's on sale give it a whirl, but it's also worth full price! you won't regret it. 

except when you're against infinite myers. maybe then.
The devs do not listen to the community, and the game is buggy.

This is a pretty interesting game I gotta say. Its not perfect, but It does has its fair parts to play. I really enjoy the killer aspect of the game more than survivor let me explain what I like about the killer aspect of the game more than the survivor side of DBD

Killer  Pros
- Challenge
- I find it more fun than survivor
- Uses your braincells
- you don't have to worry about random teammates 

Survivor Cons
- W gaming
- Hold 1 button to work on gen
- little to no skill
- oh no the killer is faster than you anyways

Though there are some cons about killer and some pros about survivor so let me share them to you

Killer Cons
- Have to deal with sweaty survivor mains
- gen rushers
- having to deal with survivors get in your way when trying to hook someone


Survivor pro's
- Fun with friends
- I guess boons are just funny

Anyways If you think you like a cat and mouse game, but with a scary/funny aspect then I would recommend this game to you
建议出个训练模式什么的，萌新买屠夫可以先练练
this games fun it has its moments but overall its good

Честно, в игре делать НЕЧЕГО.. Тут есть такие виды животных как : Читеры (да-да и их не банят), глупые люди (вроде красные ранги, но играть не умеют (совсем)) и так же вишенка на торте это господа охотники, почему "вишенка" спросите вы а потому что туннелят и кемпят у лица.
Честно, игра откровенно сдохла, она превращается в говно (хотя он им давно является) и с каждым обновлением всё хуже, ночью у РУ игроков пинг выше 80 и постоянные вылеты. (и нет, это было не только у меня)
Ну вообщем, покупать НЕ СОВЕТУЮ т.к. эта игра не стоит ваших денег, времени и нервов.

from what ive played for my 150h of gaming on this game the grind is real but the community is fantastic if you or ur friends wanna group up thats great and all but dont linger too long or the killer will find you and get free hits on you. as for the killer side of thing its a BLAST tortuing the survivors but can be stressfull at some point just keep at it and you will get the hang of it happ hunting/surviving players :)
get face camped all day by killers, get tunneled like you aint EVEN KNOW and all at the same time somehow win.....sometimes
Do you have friends on console? Do you want to play a fun co-op game with them? If so this is the game for you!! Have fun and try and survive!! 10/10 recommend
everyone who plays killer is a pussy, including me
Geiles Spiel, schön wäre eine Strafe für Camper und Tunnlern.
juego qlo como la tula, mgta la tula.

O Jogo Basicamente e simples seu objetivo. Fugir! Mas pra isso terá que consertar 5 geradores , e ai que esta a grande diversão (...) Você sente um cala frio alem de que na hora que você esta sendo perseguido o clima fica tenso.
Agora como assassino tudo que você mais precisara e ser esperto , Claro sem ser mmrd de Camper pois isto e o que deixa a desejar de muitos dos assassinos que não sabem perder e só quer campeirar o cara no Gancho
O jogo em si e excelente, deixara bons momentos tensos
Love this game, only thing i hate is sometimes you'll get into the lobbies and get an immediate dc, if there was a compensation for this that would be nice.
лучшая игра но есть баги которые нервы дадут

Nice game of playing ping pong by juggling a killer between 4 survivors trying to restore 5 generators and escaping,
or sacrificing a whole squad of survivors to the entity as the killer.
Even better when your fellow 'survivors' turn out to be the true killers in the game. It's also good when its with friends! :(( help

Jogo mal-otimizado, cheio de crashs e bugs, servidor cai toda hora... A ideia é boa mas os desenvolvedores estão cagando pra vc. Só não consegui o refund pq o meu jogo demorou muito pra fechar e antes disso os servidores tinham caído. Eu joguei 2 partidas em 2 horas. Não vou nem entrar afundo sobre o balanceamento do jogo que, tipo, não existe. Enfim, péssima experiência. Compraria por R$2,00.

Un jeu addictif et très bien ficelé de A à Z. Très intéressant et complet. Grande diversité des survivants et des tueurs.
Je recommande surtout pour jouer avec des amis en partie privée ou alors en ligne contre d'autres joueurs
jogo pra sofrer com os amigos :)
God fuck this game. Nea looks like my wife

С каждым обновлением игра становится всё интереснее! Это касается как добавлением новых багов). Их фиксов. И нового интересного контента.

P.S. Уважаемые разработчики, я и не только я, мы хотели бы, чтобы вы наконец пофиксили баг на медсестре,
касающийся невозможноссти телепортации путём спама M2.

Dead by Daylight takes the horror franchise's we know best, and allows you to experience the brutal things that they represent, you have so many Killers to play, so many survivors to kill. Endless ways to enjoy. Endless characters to try, and Endless ways to have fun. 

HOWEVER...
There can be some bugs you come across, soooo overall rating...      9/10 Would recommend !!!

Trash game: survivors just run and jump through windows, endlessly. why the game allows this, who knows but ruins the game with toxicity. Then on the killer side they just camp endlessly, again with no repercussions. To much toxicity on both sides. It completely kills the game.
